summary:
Armor Replacement (blades) with an jedi-like psiijic robe.
For male charakters only!
descriptionHtml:
JoOJediRobe
Version 0.3
(will be finished using real 3d modeling programs in the future)

Description
--------------------

this is a retexture/replacement mod based on the psiijic robe to let it look like a jedi robe. This mod is for male charakters only! 

It does NOT contain the lightsabers:
check Lord Hauns Magicka Sabers
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3174&navtag=file/images.php?id=3174&tab=3

Details
--------------------
The mod replaces the Blades armor and helmet - for male charakters only!!

Install
--------------------
Copy files (DATA) to \"yourSkyrimfolder\"
start game, equip blades armor, enjoy

Uninstall
--------------------

this is a replacement mod, so you better backup your meshes\\\\armor\\\\blades - folder if you extracted the bsa

for the textures delete the following:

textures\\\\clothes\\\\JoO



Credits
--------------------
Thanks to Bethesda 
Thanks to cgtextures.com
\"One or more textures on this 3D-model have been created with images from CGTextures.com. These images may not be redistributed by default. Please visit www.cgtextures.com for more information\"
Thanks to skyrimnexus
Thanks to all creators of niftools


Licensing
--------------------
Please contact me (xxxNEOxxx), if you want to use, or change any part of the mod but at least give me credit for the work.

For all objects modified with base skyrim resources: all rights reserved to bethesda softworks

--------------------

I take no responsibility for any harm to your computer or your personal life that occured by using these files
author: JackoO
